meanings.definition: A flat round cake of pastry or bread.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious galette for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells galettes with various fillings.
meanings.sent3: The galette looked so good, I almost thought it was a giant cookie!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly baked galette.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the galette filled the room, making everyone's mouths water.

meanings.definition: A type of French pastry made with a single crust and a sweet or savory filling.
meanings.sent1: My favorite galette is the one with apples and cinnamon.
meanings.sent2: She learned to bake a traditional French galette from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a piece of the galette and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: The galette of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The flaky crust of the galette melted in my mouth, leaving a sweet aftertaste.
